title: Fort Frederica National Monument: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility          Â   Visitor Center Film is Closed Captioned and has Audio Description (inquire at information desk for audio description headsets). Accessible parking spaces, wheelchair ramps, and accessible restrooms are provided. A wheelchair is available. The townsite has soft grass with no walkway and may not be suitable for some wheelchairs.
